name: Light Flareon
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: It creates its flames by swallowing air into a special pouch within its body, then heating it to over 3000 degrees.

attacks.name: Warm Up
attacks.effect: If you have any benched Pokémon, search your deck for a {R} Energy card and attach it to 1 of them. Then shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Burning Flame
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard a {R} Energy card attached to Light Flareon or this attack does nothing. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 damage for each heads.
